argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-icn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_mulneg12 | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( -u _i x. A ) = ( _i x. -u A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u _i x. A ) = ( _i x. -u A ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( A e. CC -> -u A e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_efival | |- ( -u A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) = ( ( cos ` -u A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) = ( ( cos ` -u A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cosneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) = ( cos ` A ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sinneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` -u A ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) = ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_mulneg2 | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 11, 12 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` -u A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) + -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 18 | 1, 11, 17 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_negsubd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) + -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) - ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 19 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` -u A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) - ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) - ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 4, 21 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) - ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
